title: DOOM Rip, anyone need it?
body:
As you know, I don’t like rips. I had one in my history of repacking (Evolve), and that’s all. But I was asked in comments to original DOOM repack, if I should make the ripped version of the game without multiplayer and snapmap (maps editor). If I do it, it will be the smallest rip available, of course. But should I put my time in it?

Vote now!

[democracy id=”5″]

PS: Language packs for the rip (if it happens) will be compatible with original full repack.
PPS: All 3 repacks listed in “Coming soon” will be published today. They all are ready and making final test runs.

OK, so be the DOOM rip.
